content: gourdgeous minis crochet version skill level beginner a classic autumn must-have for your home and a great way to use up mini skeins the gourdgeous minis are very beginner friendly and super easy to assemble these cute mini gourds are crocheted in the round with magic loop method and half-double crochets m ake a whole pumpkin patch worth and scatter them around your home for a little fall decor materials finished size approx diameter 1 mini skein or 80yds/73meters of fingering 3 /7 6cm weight category 1 yarn size us b/1-2 25mm crochet hook gauge removable stitch markers optional 7 sts x 5 row = 1 in half_double_crochet crocheted flat scissors stuffing/poly-fil tapestry needle gourdgeousknits com - instagram @gourdgeousknits - facebook com/gourdgeousknits 1 abbreviations / explanations *pattern is written in standard us terms* chain chain repeat repeat half_double_crochet half-double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch hdc2tog half-double_crochet two together st s stitch es notes the pumpkins are worked in the round beginning with the magic loop method and half double crocheting throughout the chain 2 at the start of each round counts as the first half-double_crochet rounds 1-7 are increase rounds where the number of stitches increases by 10 stitches per round to increase the number of stitches make 2 half-double crochets in the same stitch when indicated in the pattern instructions rounds 11-16 are decrease rounds where the number of stitches decreases by 10 stitches per round to decrease the number of stitches work half-double_crochet two together decreases when indicated in the pattern instructions rounds 8-10 are neither increase nor decrease rounds the stitch count per round remains at 70 stitches with 1 half-double_crochet worked in each stitch throughout each round in the rounds that say half_double_crochet in chain st which is mostly every round make a half-double_crochet in the same stitch as the chain 2 this will count as two stitches in the same stitch after round 15 pause your crocheting and begin to stuff the pumpkin with poly-fil polyester or the stuffing of your choice from your local craft store once you are satisfied with the amount of stuffing you ve added to your pumpkin continue crocheting with round 16 follow the steps for how to assemble the pumpkins use a long sturdy tapestry needle for seaming as you will need to insert the tapestry needle with a long tail through the stuffed pumpkins to make the stem use your crochet hook to chain 12 and attach the chain to the opposite end of the round fasten the step with a slip_stitch pattern instructions make a magic_ring and chain 2 the chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet here and on every round round 1 half_double_crochet 9 in magic_ring cinch tight and slip_stitch to join in the round <10 sts> round 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 2 in each st to the end slip_stitch to join <20 sts> round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet
